title: Elisa Longo Borghini Kicks Past Lotte Kopecky for Sensational Home Victory at Giro d’Italia Women
content:
Le Court wins final stage from breakaway, Longo Borgini blazes toward Tour de France Femmes via career-first victory at home tour: 'I need time to realize this.'

Read the full article at Elisa Longo Borghini Kicks Past Lotte Kopecky for Sensational Home Victory at Giro d’Italia Women on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
